      Returns a user that is in the system based on their ID.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Returns a deep copy of the users list.

      Compares Users by their last name and then by first name

      This method finds all papers of this conference authored by a user

      java.util.List<Paper> Conference.getPapersToReview(User a_user)
      This method finds all papers assigned to a reviewer
      boolean Paper.isAReviewer(User rev)

      Adds a Reviewer, Review pair to the reviewerMap.
